attributes.title: PSA
attributes.review:
Hello,

On behalf of TikTok and the Gen Z community.... we will not go down without a fight. Together we are stronger than you’ll ever be.

Thank you for your time :)

attributes.title: Very racist
attributes.review: The app asked me to list my race and the only options were white, native American, illegal, and ni***r. This is not okay apple

attributes.title: BAD
attributes.review: So I got this Poopy app and I was spammed with his racist and garbage ads. The fact that you want a rally during covid is ✨sad✨ I hate you please die

attributes.title: The literal worst
attributes.review: When I looked at this app it actually made me sick I couldn’t believe it was so bad.

attributes.title: Crashing
attributes.review: It’s really bad and it doesn’t work
Can we please get a new president already because Donald trump is making us suffer

attributes.title: Im disappointed
attributes.review: i wanted to support my orange beautiful lovely president , Donald Trump but the app started glitching & ads popped up , this app messed uo my phone , i hate it !

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: This app always crashes and isn’t useful

attributes.title: 🧚🏼🧚🏽‍♂️👋🏻🧜‍♀️🧚🏼
attributes.review: Worst app ever. I was promised after download a pizza would arrive at my door and sadly I have been waiting for 7hours. Unacceptable. Looking to sue.

attributes.title: big stump trump
attributes.review: This app shouldn’t be free. It took 3 hours to download and doesn’t give right info.
